TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceProviderContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

Docs.summary: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service contract from a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> interface defines a contract that enables a component to obtain a custom service that is defined by another component. A component that implements <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> is known as a service provider. Service providers implement the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract.QueryService%2A> method to return an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract> that implements a service.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.AddIn.Contract.IContract QueryService (string serviceIdentifier, string serviceContractIdentifier);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract QueryService(string serviceIdentifier, string serviceContractIdentifier) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the service that is being requested.
The service contract that is being requested.
Docs.summary: Returns a service contract that is implemented by this .
Docs.returns: An that represents a service contract that a client is requesting from the ; if the does not implement the requested contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The formats of the strings that identify services and service contracts are defined by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementation. It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IServiceProviderContract> implementations identify a service contract by the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property of the type that implements the service contract.
